name: Chaos Imp
text_description: The Chaos Imp is small but unpredictable. Each turn, it can randomly increase or decrease the attack, defense, or speed of a card on either side by 1.
illustration_description: An impish creature with wild, fiery eyes and horns stands amidst a chaotic vortex of multicolored energies. Its grin is mischievous, and its hands play with chaotic energy, preparing to cast it onto an unsuspecting victim.
